alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 10:59AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern St. Louis and northern Lake Counties through 1130 AM CDT... At 1059 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Birch Lake, or near Ely, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... White Iron Lake around 1110 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Birch Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Anyone at a campground should seek sturdy shelter until this storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake
